H0.text: what was thomas jefferson role in the declaration of independence. Draftsman

H1.text: what was thomas jefferson role in the declaration of independence. Editor

H2.text: what was thomas jefferson role in the declaration of independence. Committee Member

H3.text: what was thomas jefferson role in the declaration of independence. Writer

A4.text: Jefferson largely wrote the Declaration of Independence between June 11, 1776, and June 28, 1776

A5.text: Jefferson then consulted the other members of the Committee of Five who offered minor changes, and then produced another copy incorporating these alterations

A6.text: Jefferson was the primary author of the Declaration of Independence.

A7.text: Jefferson drew considerably on his proposed draft of the Virginia Constitution, George Mason's draft of the Virginia Declaration of Rights, and other sources.
